name: George Amick
introduction: George R. Amick (October 24 1924, Vernonia, Oregon - April 4 1959, Daytona Beach, Florida) was United States driver. He ran twice at the Indianapolis 500, failing to qualify in 1957, and finishing second in 1958. Amick was killed during an Indy car race at Daytona Speedway in early 1959.
